| CsA-to-SRL conversion |

In the paragraph, the term "CsA-to-SRL conversion" refers to the conversion of a chemical called CsA (cyclosporine A) into another chemical called SRL (simvastatin-related compound). This conversion is being studied in a rat model, which is a common model used in scientific research to investigate various biological processes and diseases.
